column2: p <- ggplot(gapminder, aes(year, gdpPercap)) + geom_line(color = "gray", aes(group = country)) + geom_smooth(method = loess, se = F) + scale_y_log10(labels=scales::dollar) + facet_wrap(~ continent, ncol = 5) + labs(x= "vuosi", y = "BKT/hlö", title="BKT henkilöa kohden viidella mantereella")
